about.name: Yaroslav
about.information: I am a developer with more than 6 years of experience. I am able to do everything necessary for high-quality work with the front-end. I constantly develop and study new standards and frameworks. Quickly understand the code of any complexity. Analytical thinking and non-standard thinking along with creativity helps to see different ways of solving problems. There is an understanding of design aesthetics and usability of the interface.

experience.title: Experience
experience.it20: Most of the time, I developed a JS application, periodically switching to urgent PHP projects or developing plug-ins for them. Here I got acquainted with most of PHP and JS frameworks (Zend, Laravel, WordPress, Yii, Bootstrap, Vue and others). Since 2016, I am currently the Timlid of the team of front-end developers.
experience.qs: The beginning of work came to the 5th year of study at the institute. Here I passed qualitative training on PHP, MySql, JS on the basis of Yii-framework. I learned to use OOP and develop my jQuery plugins. Participated in the development of a small online grocery store project on a competitive basis.
experience.mevs: In the service center, I learned how to collect and repair PCs, laptops and peripherals. The software installation skills and network settings allowed me to successfully use them at any place of work.
